com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq
Class AbstractCQMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.AbstractCQMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
InstallBundleMojo, PackageMojo
public abstract class AbstractCQMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Abstract class for CQ Mojos to extend, provides basic parameters and configuration values needed to interact with CQ.

Author:
dklco

Field Summary

          Flag to determine whether or not to quit and throw an error when an API call fails.

          The password to use when connecting.

          The port of the server to connect to.
protected  String user
          The username to use when connecting.

Field Detail

errorOnFailure

protected boolean errorOnFailure
Flag to determine whether or not to quit and throw an error when an API call fails. Default is true.

host

protected String host
The host of the server to connect to, including protocol. Default is 'http://localhost'.

password

protected String password
The password to use when connecting. Default is 'admin'.

port

protected String port
The port of the server to connect to. Default is '4502'.

user

protected String user
The username to use when connecting. Default is 'admin'.
